headline: Sikorsky and Bristow Group Sign Long-Term Agreement Supporting World's Largest S-92® Helicopter Fleet
summary: Sikorsky, a Lockheed Martin company (NYSE: LMT), and Bristow Group Inc. (NYSE: VTOL), the global leader in innovative and sustainable vertical flight solutions, today announced a long-term agreement to provide enhanced support for Bristow's S-92® helicopter fleet.

headline: Norway’s $1.7 Trillion Fund to Keep Buying US Stocks After Loss
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Norway’s $1.7 trillion sovereign wealth fund reported its biggest loss in six quarters in what was a roller-coaster period for markets globally, with the decline largely caused by a drop in the value of technology companies.Most Read from BloombergTrump Gives New York ‘One Last Chance’ to End Congestion FeeWhy Car YouTuber Matt Farah Is Fighting for Walkable CitiesBackyard Micro-Flats Aim to Ease South Africa’s Housing CrisisThe Racial Wealth Gap Is Not Just About MoneyTo Fuel Aff
